summary: Barlour Thief/ Archer class follower with perks that reflect his char. type.
descriptionHtml:
A follower that i created for my Little Falinesti Mod. just made him a stand alone follower that people can use without the Little Falinesti mod. he\'s a leveled char. with leveled weapons. so his lvl. depends on your lvl. Archer style combat package with perks the reflect someone of an archer class, but will dual weild daggers up close. Also he doesnt affect your stealth meter and has a good set of sneaking perks like \"lite foot\" so he doesnt set off traps and the \"backstab\" perk for ordered stealth kills(use follower command while sneaking). Depending on your lvl he just might unlock any door or chest u ask him to also...(hopefully)

Find him sitting inside the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Small table just off to the right as you enter.

Please post any issuse you may have will try and fix when made aware and ill update when possible.

rate/comment/endorse plz

Or get him with my other mod- tree top bosmer city \"Little Falinesti\":  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23570/

if there is any probblems with trying to install with NMM. just download, unzip and drop in your skyrim\'s data folder
author: Hair
